Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Palette for cosmetics
Description: Small oval palette for cosmetics hewn from an opaque quartz, the colour of which varies from light grey to light brown. It was most certainly used to grind green (malachite) and black (galena) cosmetics, though no traces of either were found.
